attrs.name: options
attrs.desc: You can configure menu button data. The default value is []. Each element in the array is an object item. Each item can contain the following fields: label, children, disabled, and divided, for example, {label:'Login', children:[],divided: true,disabled :true} .

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Display value of a menu item

attrs.name: divided
attrs.desc: Displays the split line. Default value: false

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Whether to disable the function. Default value: false

attrs.name: textField
attrs.desc: Set the key value of the displayed text of a menu button. The default value is label.

attrs.name: moreText
attrs.desc: Configure the display text of the drop-down button. The default value is More.

attrs.name: spacing
attrs.desc: Set the spacing between menu buttons. The default value is 5px.

attrs.name: popperClass
attrs.desc: Set the class name of the drop-down list box and customize the style.

attrs.name: maxShowNum
attrs.desc: Maximum number of menu buttons to be displayed. The default value is 2.

slots.name: item
slots.desc: Slots in the drop-down list box

events.name: itemClick
events.desc: The itemClick event is triggered when a menu item is selected. The transferred parameter is the data of the selected item.

events.name: moreClick
events.desc: The moreClick event is triggered when a drop-down list button is clicked.
